Author: amalms
Text: Thankyou!!! i hope you get better and are safe too :^) <3

Author: amy-shakes
Text: i’ve always thought this would happen if i spoke about my ed to someone but encourage her to eat more and even if it’s hard for you as well please try to take her out to eat and eat with her so it’s less lonely and have lunch together or even try to make her a lunch one day as well social eating is a lot easier than only one person eating but make sure it’s from the hard not like forcing her to eat but i hope you both get better and stay safe <3
